examples.example: 他努力工作，就是为了能获得更高的薪水来改善生活。

translate.english: He works hard just to be able to obtain a higher salary to improve life.

examples.example: 凭借自己的努力，他获得了丰厚的薪水，生活也过得越来越滋润。

translate.english: With his own efforts, he got a丰厚 salary and his life is getting better and better.

examples.example: 我的努力付出得到了回报，薪水也随之增长，这让我感到十分欣慰。

translate.english: My hard work has been rewarded, and the salary has also increased accordingly, which makes me feel very gratified.
